Bury St Edmunds Mobile Library Route 17

Contact us:

Managers: Carl Bell and Kevin Lambert

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
17A Stowupland Jubilee Court 0930-0950
17B Stowupland The Green 0955-1015
17C Wattisfield Honey Pot Lane 1040-1055
17D Wattisfield Village Hall 1100-1120
17E Stanton 21 Windmill Green 1125-1210
17E2 Barningham Bishopscroft 1220-1240
17F Bardwell Dunn Cow 1245-1305
17G Bury St Edmunds Moreton Hall, Community Centre 1400-1600

Calling every 4 weeks on Tuesdays:

2020: 28 January, 25 February, 24 March, 21 April, 19 May, 16 June, 14 July, 11 August, 8 September, 6 October, 3 November, 1 December, 29 December
